sample_docs: Banking & Finance Banking and financial institutions deal with an array of documents on an everyday basis. Accurascan streamlines the handling of these documents by fast scanning and digitization. Ways Accurascan helps the banking & finance industry Declutter the desk by digitizing financial documents that have machine-readable data Eliminate the possibility of any loss or damage to vital documents by easy digitization and storage on a secured cloud server Reduction in manual typing of customer details that ultimately saves time Easy integration with an online application or existing app or customization to extend the scanning capability of Accurascan to scan all type of documents by opting for our SDK Benefits of Accura Scan Compatible with both Android and iOS platforms Availability of SDK for both Android and iOS platforms Availability of Web API and SDK which can be installed on your server Eliminates manual data entry errors Provides digital storage, saves costs of document copying, filing and storage Easy search, track, sort, print and report generation capabilities Automates the process of ID document collection, submission & filing Improves staff output To get a trial version of our SDK, please visit our contact us page. You can also drop a mail at connect@accurascan.com and know how our SDK can help you to fulfill your business needs. Secure User Registration This process prevents fraud by ensuring it can only be completed by real human users. If you already have an account, you can use your 3D Face to access your account. Choose Your Username Your username is the unique identifier that enables you to access your account on new devices. This can be a phone number, email address, or anonymous identifier Please provide valid Username Just center your face in the oval, then lean in for your close up when the oval expands. auth Processing 3D Face Data & Verifying Liveness One Moment Please... processing.. Processing... Face Authentication Complete! Thank you for using ZoOm Face Authentication Failed to try again This process prevents fraud by ensuring it can only be completed by real human users. If you already have an account, you can use your 3D Face to access your account. Just center your face in the oval, then lean in for your close up when the oval expands. Accura Technolabs considers the privacy and personal information of customers and visitors as highly important. Accura Technolabs treats your personal information with outmost confidentiality. Accura Technolabs's security levels regarding the use of personal data are sufficient to be able to prevent unauthorized access, changes or loss of personal information. Cookies Accura Scan's website uses cookies. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your hard disk when you visit a website. If you use social media sharebuttons on the Accura Scan website, cookies are used to remember your social media settings for future use. The Accura Scan website uses Google Analytics, which is a Google Inc. (Google) web analysis service. Google Analytics uses cookies to analyse the use of the Accura Scan website and for reports on website activities. Information generated by these cookies is transferred and stored by Google on a USA-based server. For more information, see: http://www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/ Newsletters Accura Scan regularly sends newsletters and invitations to people in our network who are interested. Every newsletter contains a link that allows you to unsubscribe. The list of subscribers is never shared with third parties. Demo App Accura Technolabs provides, through the Google Play Store and iTunes Store, the Accura Scan demo app, We provide this app free of charge to demonstrate and improve the underlying Accura Scan Application. What personal information is processed and stored? Accura Technolabs thus does not collect personal information. We do not know nor want to know who the users of our demo app are and whose identity documents are scanned. The app however does need to process the personal information that is on the MRZ of the identity document, including privacy-sensitive information like name, date of birth, personal number and document number. In addition, the app scans via Optical Character Recognition technology (or alternatively via manual entry) the date of birth, date of expiry and document number since these are needed to get access to the information on the passport. The app processes this information locally on the smartphone, i.e., the app does not send personal information to a server for processing. The personal information that is processed is not stored on the smartphone. How is the personal information secured? Since all the processing of personal information is done on the phone, the confidentiality of this information depends on the security of the phone. The app uses encrypted network connections for the communication of usage information. Accura Technolabs considers the privacy and personal information of customers and visitors as highly important. Airlines The airline industry is currently undergoing a turbulent phase because of rising security concerns. An ID card scanner app like Accurascan inexpensively mitigates the security risks to a considerable extent. Ways Accurascan helps the airline industry Streamline the entire check-in process by passport scanning in less than a second & minimize manual typing of passport data Bar any non-staffer with a forged ID card through quick scanning of each staffer's ID card at entry points Easy record keeping of documents in a digital format on your server Seamless integration with any security app by use of SDK Benefits of Accura Scan Compatible with both Android and iOS platforms Availability of SDK for both Android and iOS platforms Availability of Web API and SDK which can be installed on your server Eliminates manual data entry errors Provides digital storage, saves costs of document copying, filing and storage Easy search, track, sort, print and report generation capabilities Automates the process of ID document collection, submission & filing Improves staff output To get a trial version of our SDK, please visit our contact us page. You can also drop a mail at connect@accurascan.com and know how our SDK can help you to fulfill your business needs.
